channel.title: The Dating Detectives on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics
channel.description: Recent content in The Dating Detectives on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: Young Love: Part 2 | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Lauren continues her dogfish story, with a shocking ending! Make sure to stay till the end to hear more information on some of the conditions discussed in this episode. Click here to join our Patreon! For only $5 a month you will get 2 extra episodes a month, monthly virtual live events, and access to our community page! This episode is sponsored by HelloFresh. Go to HelloFresh.com/tddfree and use code tddfree for FREE breakfast for life!

item.title: Young Love: Part 1 | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Mackenzie and Hanna hear Lauren's dogfish story of her college sweetheart who became her husband. After her husband had three medical crisis in one year she realized that this relationship was far more than she bargained for. Tune in next Monday to hear the shocking conclusion to this story! Join our Patreon! For only $5 a month you will get 2 extra episodes a month, monthly virtual live events, and access to our community page!

item.title: Mackenzie Undercover: To Kik or Not to Kik | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Mackenzie tells Hanna about a potential cheating case where she ended up going undercover on the notorious app, Kik. This episode of The Dating Detectives is sponsored by Dipsea. For an extended 30 day free trial go to dipsea.com/TDD This episode of The Dating Detectives is sponsored by Apostrophe. To get your first visit for $5 ($15 of savings!) visit apostrophe.com/TDD and use code TDD at checkout. This episode of The Dating Detectives is sponsored by Quince.

item.title: Dogfish Expert: Prenups & Protecting Yourself with Lawyer Leslie Barbara | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description The Dating Detectives are joined by divorce attorney Leslie Barbara. Leslie has 30 years of experience representing a wide range of high profile clients. She went through her own dogfish experience and shares her story of courage and resiliency that led to her passion for helping people out of toxic relationships. Mackenzie and Hanna talk to Leslie about how to get an order of protection, if you should get a prenup, and how you can protect yourself from getting dogfished.

item.title: The Origin Story: Part 2 | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Mackenzie dug up the tea on Simon and Erica is back to find out the truth! Join our Patreon! item.title: The Origin Story | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Mackenzie and Hanna hear the story that started it all! Erica dated a man who may or may not be a dogfish. In this episode we hear her story, and then Mackenzie will do an investigation and bring us the answers we need to crack the case! This episode of The Dating Detectives is sponsored by BetterHelp. Visit betterhelp.com/tdd today to get 10% off your first month. This episode of The Dating Detectives is sponsored by Dipsea.

item.title: Halloween Special: Ghosted | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Mackenzie and Hanna talk to Licensed Clinical Mental Health Counselor Amanda Beck about her own ghosting story, as well as reading ghosting stories from listeners to try and understand why people ghost and why getting ghosted hurts so much! Amanda Beck is a Licensed Clinical Mental Health Counselor in the states of North and South Carolina. While I am a therapist, it's important to note this is not therapy and nothing shared today should be construed as a substitute for working with a qualified provider.

item.title: Mackenzie Undercover: The Kool-Aid Man | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Mackenzie tells Hanna about a surveillance case that gets complicated when the subjects wife comes barging in like the Kool-aid Man! item.title: The Tik Tok Swindler | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description We are back with a brand new episode! This one is absolutely insane. Mackenzie and Hanna talk to our very first male dogfish victim, and he shares his wild story that will make us all go and change out passwords! This episode of The Dating Detectives is sponsored by Dipsea. For listeners of the show, Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial when you go to DipseaStories.

item.title: Mackenzie Undercover: The Baby Bump | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Mackenzie gets a call from a girlfriend who has become suspicious after her boyfriends "overtime" doesn't show up on his paycheck. The story might start like many others, but it takes a turn for the crazy when Mackenzie stakes out his office and discovers that the truth is not always as simple as it may seem! Join our Patreon! https://www.patreon.com/TheDatingDetectives?utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator Instagram & Tik Tok - @DatingDetectivesPodcast Facebook - The Dating Detectives Podcast

item.title: Dr. Dogfish | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Mackenzie and Hanna talk to a dogfish victim whose therapist husband used his knowledge of psychology to convince her she couldn’t trust her femmetuition. You will not believe the twists and turns that this story takes! ALSO VERY EXCITING ANNOUNCEMENT!!! We are officially live on Patreon! Join now at the link below to get 2 bonus episodes a month, access to live virtual events, and a community group chat for our most dedicated fans!

item.title: Mackenzie Undercover: Bad Babysitters ft. Kendahl Landreth & Sarah Schauer | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Mackenzie and Hanna are joined by Kendahl Landreth and Sarah Schauer to tell the story of a babysitter who went outside of the job description. If you want more of Kendahl and Sarah, check out the BCC Club Podcast @thebccclub @kendahllandreth @sarahschauer The Dating Detectives is sponsored by BetterHelp. Instagram & Tik Tok - @DatingDetectivesPodcast Facebook - The Dating Detectives Podcast Mackenzie's Socials - @Freedom_Barbie Hanna's Socials - @HannaAndergram

item.title: The OG Dogfish with Terra Newell | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Today we are joined by the most bad ass guest, Terra Newell! Terra is the survivor of an attack by her mom's con man husband, John "Dirty John" Meehan. She sits down with Mackenzie and Hanna to tell her story and share what she learned about dating after being attacked by the original dog-fish. Check out Terra's podcast, The Survivor Squad, wherever you get your podcasts! Terra's socials - @terranewell @thesurvivorsquadpod

item.title: Confessions of a Dogfish | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description We have a very special episode today that’s a little bit different. Since we started the show we have wanted to talk to someone who has been on the other side of these stories, and then one day we got an email from a man named Jim who wanted to come on do exactly that. Today Jim, a recovering chronic cheater and sex addict, tells us his story to share the red flags that women missed while dating him.

item.title: Mackenzie Undercover: In the Nude | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Mackenzie tells Hanna a wild story that takes us to a nudist community and on an exploration of polyamorous relationships! If you have a story that you would like to share on the podcast, send us an email at Investigate@DatingDetectivePod.com Follow us on Instagram, Tik Tok, and Facebook @DatingDetectivesPodcast Hosted by Mackenzie Fultz & Hanna Anderson Produced by Mollie Biskar ***The following Program contains names, places and events that have been anonymized or fictionalized for the purposes of protection and safety.

item.description: Podcast Description Part two of Ashley's harrowing story involving catfish, dogfish, and everything in between! PSA: This is episode 6 of 6 in season one of The Dating Detectives! Thank you so much for your overwhelming support of show so far. We are taking a two week break and will be back with new episodes on 6/19! ***The following Program contains names, places and events that have been anonymized or fictionalized for the purposes of protection and safety.

item.title: 2: Mr. Audi: F*** Fast | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description This week Mackenzie and Hanna bring you the story of one dog fish whose multiple year long con with three different women was brought down by one simple Facebook post. Mackenzie and Hanna talk to these three women about what they went through, and how being dog fished by the same man made them lifelong friends. ***The following Program contains names, places and events that have been anonymized or fictionalized for the purposes of protection and safety.

item.title: 1: The Widow Hunter & His Depressed Bird | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description Mackenzie & Hanna are on their first case! Kat's mom lost her husband recently and is trying to get back into dating, so Kat helped her get set up on some online dating sites. Kat was excited for her mom to find love again, until she met Tom. Something about Tom is just off, so she calls in The Dating Detectives. Tune in to listen to them crack the case of Tom, his house hunting, and his depressed bird.

item.title: Dating Detectives Trailer | The Dating Detectives
item.description: Podcast Description New episodes out each Monday! Are you tired of swiping right? Only to find your date is a complete fraud. Do you want to avoid the liars, cheaters, and conmen that are lurking on dating apps? Then you need to listen to Dating Detectives, the podcast that exposes the dogfish of the online dating. I'm Mackenzie Fultz, a licensed private investigator with years of experience catching the bad guys.
